body:
Hello!

Today's discussion starter is, What do you want to be when you grow up? I was pondering about what question to ask for this edition of D.S, and thought that this question made good sense to bring up! In more detail, What job/occupation would you pursue in the future? Example: I want to be a software developer, and I have a dream about working at google some day! Your statement can be anything you want it to be! 

Peace!

C_P

*Quick heads up, I'm going to start calling these discussion starters as "chat cafe's." I thought this sounded better than "discussion starters." If you have any other ideas tell me in your comments ^-^*
